content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <metadata> <idinfo> <citation> <citeinfo> <origin>Bureau of Transportation Statistics</origin> <pubdate>2001</pubdate> <title>West Virginia Populated Places</title> <geoform>vector digital data</geoform> <onlink>http://www.wvgis.wvu.edu/data/dataset.php?action=search&ID=173</onlink> <lworkcit> <citeinfo> <origin>Bureau of Transportation Statistics (BTS), United States Department of Transportation</origin> <pubdate>2001</pubdate> <title>National Transportation Atlas Databases (NTAD)</title> <geoform>vector digital data</geoform> <onlink>http://www.bts.gov/publications/north_american_transportation_atlas_data/</onlink> </citeinfo> </lworkcit> </citeinfo> </citation> <descript> <abstract>The National Populated Places database is a geographic database of populated places in the United States containing information on the location and 1990 Census population. This dataset is a subset of that and the extent of the data is within the state of West Virginia.</abstract> <purpose>The data provide users with information about the locations, names, and 1990 populations of specific places.</purpose> </descript> <timeperd> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>2001</caldate> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <current>publication date</current> </timeperd> <status> attribute accuracy report has been completed.</attraccr> </attracc> <logic>Each place in this data set is represented as a point feature.\ufffd\ufffd The unique identifier (FEATUREID) contains the\ufffd\ufffdconcatenated value of State FIPS Code plus FIPS Place Code for use as the link to the attributes.</logic> <complete>This data set contains every record found in the data provided by the Bureau of the Census.</complete> <posacc> <horizpa> <horizpar>No horizontal accuracy report has been complteted.</horizpar> </horizpa> <vertacc> <vertaccr>No vertical accuracy report has been
